name: Dig Down (itch) (Creator190)
description:
(This project was carried out in a short period of time and as part of an examination of my studies. Also, this is my first game I´ve ever created completely by myself.)

You fell into a huge hole without a ground infested with spiders.
Try to collect as many points as possible before the huge spider gets to you!

Controls:

A Key / Left arrow key: Move to the left
S Key / Down arrow key: Dig down (Using this ability costs 25% of your existing points)
D Key / Right arrow key: Move to the right
Enter key: Next
